name: BlockPush - A fun way to use physics
name_original: BlockPush - A fun way to use physics
description:
Block Push is a fun pass-time game where you use physics to drive a sphere as far as you can while dodging different obstacles.

The objective of this game is to gain points by picking up Points Pickup while rolling a ball through an endless vertically scrolling platform and dodging different obstacles.

Instructions:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Give the ball direction and speed

Point Pickup - Give the player Points

Powerup Pickup - Give the player a special ability for a limited time.

The obstacles have different color and every color means the obstacle will react a different way when touched. Can you figure it out what obstacles are good and bad for the player?
